Text: how do you play mkv files?
u`ll need Matroska codecs to play MKV files!
Search on google for "Combined-Community-Codec-Pack-2007-07-22"... download and install it... this pack contains the required codecs...u`ll then b able to play MKV files on WMP!

Don't forget to tell them that installing the CCCP pack can kill all your other codecs...

People that incode oddball formats/codecs suck.
